summary: DRIVING DOWN THE FREEWAY, CRUISE CONTROL SHUT OFF AND EVERY LIGHT ON THE DASHBOARD LIT UP.  AFTER TURNING OFF THE CAR FOR A WHILE, THINGS WENT BACK TO NORMAL.  ON A LATER DATE, I PULLED INTO A PARKING LOT TURNED OFF THE IGNITION AND REMOVED THE KEY--BUT THE CAR WAS STILL RUNNING.  THE CAR FINALLY TURNED OFF AFTER FOUR OR FIVE ATTEMPTS TO REINSERT THE KEY, TURN BACK TO RUN, BACK TO OFF, ETC., SHIFTING FROM PARK TO DRIVE AND BACK.  RESEARCHING ONLINE, IT APPEARS THAT THESE ISSUES ARE SYMPTOMS OF A FAULTY TIPM.  *TR
